Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِلَى عِمَارَةِ دَارِ الْبَقَاءِ أَحْوَجُ مِنْكُمْ إِلَى عِمَارَةِ دَارِ الْفَنَاءِ
enWisdom: Verily you are in greater need of developing the permanent abode [of the Hereafter] than you are of building the temporary abode [of this world]

Wisdom: شِيمَةُ ذَوِي الْأَلْبَابِ وَالنُّهَى الْإِقْبَالُ عَلَى دَارِ الْبَقَاءِ وَالْإِعْرَاضُ عَنْ دَارِ الْفَنَاءِ وَالتَّوَلُّهُ بِجَنَّةِ الْمَأْوَى
enWisdom: The practice of those who possess intellect and understanding is turning towards the permanent abode, turning away from the evanescent abode and being desirous of the Garden of Paradise

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ عَرَفَ رَبَّهُ كَيْفَ لَا يَسْعَى لِدَارِ الْبَقَاءِ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who knows his Lord, how can he not strive for the everlasting abode?!

Wisdom: دَعَاكُمُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ إِلَى دَارِ الْبَقَاءِ وَقَرَارَةِ الْخُلُودِ وَالنَّعْمَاءِ وَمُجَاوَرَةِ الْأَنْبِيَاءِ وَالسُّعَدَاءِ فَعَصَيْتُمْ وَدَعَتْكُمُ الدُّنْيَا إِلَى قَرَارَةِ الشَّقَاءِ وَمَحَلِّ الْفَنَاءِ وَأَنْوَاعِ الْبَلَاءِ وَالْعَنَاءِ فَأَطَعْتُمْ وَبَادَرْتُمْ وَأَسْرَعْتُمْ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, called you to the Eternal Abode and the permanent residence, and great blessings and proximity to the Prophets and the felicitous, but you sinned and turned away; whereas this world called you to an abode of wretchedness and the place of annihilation and different types of tribulations and hardships, but you obeyed it and quickly rushed [towards it]
The goal of the Hereafter is everlasting [life]

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ خُلُودٌ وَبَقَاءٌ
enWisdom: Everything in the Hereafter has perpetuity and everlastingness

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمَّرَ دَارَ إِقَامَتِهِ فَهُوَ الْعَاقِلُ
enWisdom: One who builds the abode of his permanent dwelling is truly wise

Wisdom: مَا الْمَغْبُوطُ الَّذِي فَازَ مِنْ دَارِ الْبَقَاءِ بِبُغْيَتِهِ كَالْمَغْبُونِ الَّذِي فَاتَهُ النَّعِيمُ بِسُوءِ اخْتِيَارِهِ وَشَقَاوَتِهِ
enWisdom: The fortunate one who becomes prosperous in the permanent abode by attaining his desires is not like the deceived one who loses the bounties [of the Hereafter] because of his bad choices and wretchedness

Wisdom: لَا تَرْغَبْ فِيمَا يَفْنَى وَخُذْ مِنَ الْفَنَاءِ لِلْبَقَاءِ
enWisdom: Do not desire that which perishes, and take from the transient for the eternal

Wisdom: دَارُ الْبَقَاءِ مَحَلُّ الصِّدِّيقِينَ وَمَوْطِنُ الْأَبْرَارِ وَالصَّالِحِينَ
enWisdom: The Everlasting Abode [of Paradise] is the home of the veracious and the dwelling of the virtuous and righteous
